title: Doom maps
description: I've also contributed to the Doom modding community, those projects are listed on a dedicated page.

title: The Last Beacon
description:
A logic platformer game I originally made for Ludum Dare #28 back in 2014 and constantly improve since 2019. Created with Love2D (Lua framework).

Repository - there are additional plans to rebuild the original in TypeScript.

title: Sparatiro
description:
A wiki engine / note service intended to have minimalistic pages and no code-specific backend requirements.

Repository

title: Taggregator
description:
A WIP frontend for the Steem blockchain with the purpose of creating a custom, real-time post browsing application for various tag feeds.

Repository

title: Mori-NN
description:
An early attempt to create a neural network creation tool in the browser.
